posts.post_content:
A few rare postcards available for sale...

1905 Souvenir Postcard Shop of Cleveland
Bob Rhoades - (group of 4 sold in last REA for $975 each) SOLD

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/misc/websize/1905%20Cleveland%20PC%20Rhoades.jpg[/IMG]

1912 Underwood & Underwood
Hick Cady - SOLD

1912 Underwood & Underwood
Rube Marquard - SOLD

1918 RPPC Washington Senators w/ Johnson
extremely rare, one of two known... $1150

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/misc/websize/1918%20Washington%20Senators.jpg[/IMG]
Free shipping, checks preferred or will split Paypal fees.
Lose at poker again? Very tempting. Terrific postcards all. Presuming my Senators pc is the other one of two.

Ha!  Poker's been good, Super Bowl not so much.

Yep, your Washington rppc is the other one.
bump for price drop before sending to AH
